title: Creating a Modern React Portfolio
excerpt: Design and code your personal React portfolio with Vite and Tailwind — stylish, fast, and developer-friendly.

content.text: Introduction

In this tutorial, we will build a personal portfolio using React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. The portfolio will showcase experience, skills, projects, and include smooth animations and multilingual support.
Tech Stack
Project Setup

# Clone repository
git clone https://github.com/faidrn/my-portfolio.git
cd my-portfolio

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Start development server
npm run dev

# Open your browser at
http://localhost:5173
Project Structure

my-portfolio/
├── public/
├── src/
│   ├── components/
│   │   ├── ui/
│   │   ├── sections/
│   │   ├── common/
│   │   └── layout/
│   ├── contexts/
│   │   └── LanguageContext.jsx
│   ├── App.jsx
│   ├── App.css
│   ├── index.css
│   └── main.jsx
├── package.json
├── vite.config.js
├── tailwind.config.js
└── README.md
Creating the Tabs Component
We use a flexible Tabs component with triggers and content that respond to clicks:

<Tabs defaultValue={0}>
  <TabsList>
    <TabsTrigger>Experience</TabsTrigger>
    <TabsTrigger>Education</TabsTrigger>
    <TabsTrigger>Skills</TabsTrigger>
  </TabsList>

  <TabsContent>Content for Experience</TabsContent>
  <TabsContent>Content for Education</TabsContent>
  <TabsContent>Content for Skills</TabsContent>
</Tabs>
Badge Component
Badges are small labels for dates, skills, or tags:
<Badge variant="secondary">2022 - Present</Badge>
Integrating Tabs in Resume Section
Inside Resume.jsx, import Tabs, TabsList, TabsTrigger, TabsContent, and Badge. Use state to switch between sections:
Animations
Use Framer Motion to animate sections and list items:

<motion.div
  initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
  whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
  transition={{ duration: 0.4 }}
>
  {/* Content */}
</motion.div>
Multilanguage Support
Use LanguageContext to provide translations for labels and text throughout your portfolio.
Conclusion
You now have a modern React portfolio with a responsive design, tabs for sections, badges for details, animations, and multilingual support.
